html.body:
<!-- WAT 216 test activation code -->
<script>
if ($("div.swatches.size unselectable").length) {
  window.optimizely.push(["activate", 1111621214]);
}
</script>
<!-- End of WAT 216 test activation code -->


<!-- WAT 220 test activation code -->
<script>

  var interval = setInterval(function() {
      if ($('p.livechat').css('display') == 'block') {
          window.optimizely.push(["activate", 1115194659]);
          clearInterval(interval);
      }
  }, 10);
  
</script>
<!-- End of WAT 220 test activation code -->

<!-- WAT 219 test activation code -->
<script>
if($(".plp .segmented-grid").length) {
    window.optimizely.push(["activate", 1033248119]);                                           
}
</script>
<!-- End of WAT 219 test activation code -->


<!-- WAT 206 test activation code -->
<script>
if($("#pdpMain .addtocartbutton").length) {
               $("#pdpMain .addtocartbutton").addClass("ab-test");
               $("#pdpMain").one("mouseenter", ".ab-test", function(event) {
                              window.optimizely.push(["activate", 1011836366]);
                              $("#pdpMain .addtocartbutton").removeClass("ab-test");     
               });
}

</script>
<!-- End of WAT 206 test activation code -->

<!-- add to bag overlay activation -->
<!-- Temp turn off - Caspar - script>
jQuery(".addtocartbutton").data('layer','overlay')
</script -->



<script>
$("#product-grid").one('mousedown', '#videocontent', function () {
	cmCreateElementTag($(".page-heading h1").text(), 'PLP Video');
	console.log($(".page-heading h1").text(), 'PLP Video');
});
</script>

<!-- PLP Fixes by Thomas -->
<style>
.innercard .customizable a, .innercard .personalizable a {
color: #5c5c5c !important;
}

.hover .personalizable {
display:none
}

.showmore {
padding:0 0 0 20px !important;
}

.productimage img {
height: 142px;
width:142px;
}


</style>

<!-- End of PLP Fixed -->

<!-- Temporary Filter Interaction Tracking -->
<script>
var page = $(".selected-filter a").map(function() { return $(this).text(); }).toArray().join(', ');
$( "#filters" ).one( "hover", "ul li a", function () {
	var a = $(this); a.attr('manual_cm_sp', 'Filter-_-P: ' + page + '-_-A: ' + a.data('refname') + ': ' + a.data('refvalue')) ;

});

$( "#leftcolumn" ).one( "hover", ".selected-filters a", function () {
	var a = $(this); a.attr('manual_cm_sp', 'Filter-_-P: ' + page + '-_-R: ' + a.text()) ;

});
</script>

<!-- Mygirls -->
<script>
$('li.micoach a').addClass('sf-with-ul');
$(".right .topcat_list_item").eq(-4).after($(".right .topcat_list_item:last"));
</script>

<!-- Super Wide Flyout Fix -->
<script>
$('.subcategorymenu').slice(0,2).css({'margin-left': 0, 'left': 0});
</script>

<script>
var type, promotion, link, slotNumber = 1, heroPromotions = new Array(), i = 0;

// Cycle through all available Content Slots in this order
$(".hp-slot-1, #hp-slot-2, #hp-slot-3, #hp-slot-4, .shp-slot-1, .shp-slot-2, #shp-slot-3, #shp-slot-4, #shp-slot-5, #shp-slot-6, #shp-slot-7, #glp-slot-1, #glp-slot-2, #glp-slot-3, #glp-slot-4, #glp-slot-5, #clp-slot-1, #clp-slot-2, #clp-slot-3, #clp-slot-4, #clp-slot-5, #clp-slot-6").each(function() {   
     // Type
     type = 'slot-' + slotNumber;

     // Cycle through all Hero Elements
     $(this).find('.slide').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          // Hero on SHP, GLP and CLP
          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
         
          // Store Asset Names in Array for HP Hero (see next block)
          heroPromotions[i] = $(this).data('contentasset');        
          i++;
         
     });

     // Hero on HP
     i = 0;
     $(this).find('.slide_link_wrapper').each(function() {
          promotion = heroPromotions[i];

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });

          i++;
     });   

     // Link Area   
     i = 1;
     $(this).find('.glp-menu ul, .clp-menu ul').each(function() {
          promotion = 'linkfarm-column-' + i;

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });

          i++;
     });             


     // Feature
     $(this).find('.features_slot .block').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Team        
     $(this).find('.teams_slot .block > div').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Brandpromo        
     $(this).find('.brandspromo_slot .block').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Brandshop
     $(this).find('.brandshop').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).find('.brandspromoasset').data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   

     slotNumber++;
});

// Header
$(".categorymenu .topcat_list_item").each(function(index) {  
     var currentTopcatListItem = $(this).find('a.topcat_link, a.shop');

     if(currentTopcatListItem.length > 0) {   
          promotion  = currentTopcatListItem.text();
          link = promotion;

          currentTopcatListItem.attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header' + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());

          $(this).find('.subcategorymenu a').each(function(index) {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );
          });      
     }
});

// Customer Data
$("#header .headercustomerinfo").each(function(index) {   
     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-customerinfo-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});

// Subnav
$(".subnav").each(function(index) {   
     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-subnav-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});

// Contextual Mastheads in Grid
$("#main-area .plp-masthead-container").each(function(index) {    
	var segment = $(this).find('h2').text();
	
	$(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
		link = $(this).text();

		$(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'plp_masthead-_-' + segment +  '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );         
	});    
});

// Footer
$("#footer .footer-copy ul").each(function(index) {   
     promotion = $(this).find('h5').text();

     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'footer-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});

// Mi Adidas
$(".design-gallery-promo").each(function(index) {   
     promotion = 'Inspirations';

     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = 'Gallery';
          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'mipdp-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()           );        
     });   
});

$(".pdp_carousel.inspiration").each(function(index) {   
     promotion = 'Carousel';

     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = 'Product';
          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'mipdp-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()           );        
     });   
});
</script>

<script>
$('.subcategorymenu').slice(0,2).css({'margin-left': 0, 'left': 0});
</script>

<script>
$(function() {
	setTimeout(function() {
		if($(".orbit-wrapper").length > 0) {
			$(".orbit-wrapper").find('.title, .intro').addClass('text-shadow');
		}

	}, 500);  // will work with every browser
});
</script>

<script>
	$(document).on('click', 'a.video-dialog', function(event) {
		event.preventDefault();	
				
		app.dialog.open(
			this.href+((this.href.indexOf('?') > 0)?'&view=ajax':'?view=ajax'), $(this).text(), { 
				"width":853, 
				"height":500, 
				"dialogClass":"video", 
				"close": function(event, ui){
					jQuery(this).dialog("destroy")
				}
			}
		);
	});
</script>

<script>
var type, promotion, link, slotNumber = 1, heroPromotions = new Array(), i = 0;
// Cycle through all available Content Slots in this order
$(".hp-slot-1, #hp-slot-2, #hp-slot-3, #hp-slot-4, .shp-slot-1, .shp-slot-2, #shp-slot-3, #shp-slot-4, #shp-slot-5, #shp-slot-6, #shp-slot-7, #glp-slot-1, #glp-slot-2, #glp-slot-3, #glp-slot-4, #glp-slot-5, #clp-slot-1, #clp-slot-2, #clp-slot-3, #clp-slot-4, #clp-slot-5, #clp-slot-6").each(function() { 
// Type
type = 'slot-' + slotNumber;
// Cycle through all Hero Elements
$(this).find('.slide').each(function() {
promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');
// Hero on SHP, GLP and CLP
$(this).find('a').each(function()
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); });

// Store Asset Names in Array for HP Hero (see next block)
heroPromotions[i] = $(this).data('contentasset'); 
i++;

});

// Hero on HP
i = 0;
$(this).find('.slide_link_wrapper').each(function() {
promotion = heroPromotions[i];

$(this).find('a').each(function() { link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); }
);
i++;
});
// Link Area 
i = 1;
$(this).find('.glp-menu ul, .clp-menu ul').each(function() {
promotion = 'linkfarm-column-' + i;
$(this).find('a').each(function()
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); });

i++;
}); 


// Feature
$(this).find('.features_slot .block').each(function() {
promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

$(this).find('a').each(function() { link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); }
);
});
// Team 
$(this).find('.teams_slot .block > div').each(function() {
promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');
$(this).find('a').each(function()
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); });
}); 


// Brandpromo 
$(this).find('.brandspromo_slot .block').each(function() {
promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

$(this).find('a').each(function() { link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); }
);
});
// Brandshop
$(this).find('.brandshop').each(function() {
promotion = $(this).find('.brandspromoasset').data('contentasset');
$(this).find('a').each(function()
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase()); }
);
});
slotNumber++;
});
// Header
$(".categorymenu .topcat_list_item").each(function(index) { 
var currentTopcatListItem = $(this).find('a.topcat_link, a.shop');
if(currentTopcatListItem.length > 0) { 
promotion = currentTopcatListItem.text();
link = promotion;
currentTopcatListItem.attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header' + '' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '' + link.toLowerCase());
$(this).find('.subcategorymenu a').each(function(index)
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() ); }
); 
}
});
// Customer Data
$("#header .headercustomerinfo").each(function(index) { 
$(this).find('a').each(function(index)
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-customerinfo-_-' + link.toLowerCase() ); }
); 
});
// Subnav
$(".subnav").each(function(index) { 
$(this).find('a').each(function(index)
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-subnav-_-' + link.toLowerCase() ); }
); 
});
// Footer
$("#footer .footer-copy ul").each(function(index) { 
promotion = $(this).find('h5').text();
$(this).find('a').each(function(index)
{ link = $(this).text(); $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'footer-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() ); }
); 
});
</script>
